mapper.insert: insert into b_data_table( source_id, data_type, bank_name, table_name, creater, create_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{sourceId}, #{dataType}, #{bankName}, #{tableName}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update b_data_table set source_id = #{dataTable.sourceId}, data_type = #{dataTable.dataType}, bank_name = #{dataTable.bankName}, table_name = #{dataTable.tableName}, creater = #{dataTable.creater}, create_time = #{dataTable.createTime}, state = #{dataTable.state}, iscancel = #{dataTable.iscancel}, remark = #{dataTable.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, source_id AS sourceId, data_type AS dataType, bank_name AS bankName, table_name AS tableName, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_table where id = #{id}

select id, source_id AS sourceId, data_type AS dataType, bank_name AS bankName, table_name AS tableName, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_table where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
